segments.text: I observe the woman standing at the sink, carefully drying her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over gently onto the counter and floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, her attention solely on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy climbs the stool toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar sits open, inviting his small hand inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches closely, her arm extended in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool remains steady for now, despite its slight tilt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters through the window, illuminating the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way, neat and trimmed along the fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures a typical moment in a family home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything appears calm on the surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet beneath, small details hint at everyday life unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
